scripts.prepack: ../../scripts/nws.sh build -d && pipenv run python setup.py bdist_wheel
scripts.test:cov: ../../scripts/nws.sh build -d && pipenv run python -m coverage run -m unittest
scripts.test:report: pipenv run python -m coverage html && xdg-open htmlcov/index.html
scripts.lint: pipenv run pyright && pipenv run pylint api_server --ignore=ros_pydantic
